Classes in com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core that implement Entity
 class EntityAdapter
          Provides an adapter that permits ordinary objects to be handled as entities without implementing the Entity interface directly.

          Computes the next transition that may be chained to a previous transition as the result of changes which cause a given guard's accept to fire.
